REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1833 reute d f BC-MID-STATE-<MSSL>,-FIR 04-03 0067

TEXT.TITLE: MID-STATE <MSSL>, FIRST FEDERAL IN DEAL
TEXT.BODY: Mid-State Federal Savings and Loan Association said it and First Federal Savings and Loan Association of Brooksville <FFBV> reached a definitive merger agreement. As previously announced, Brooksville shareholders will get cash and stock in exchange for their shares. The transaction is expected to be completed during the summer 1987. Reuter
